thread.title: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo to Grant Parolees Right to Vote

author: Mike Vilensky
title: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo to Grant Parolees Right to Vote
text:
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo on Wednesday used executive powers to grant all parolees in New York the right to vote, bypassing the state Legislature on a measure long-sought by activists.
The move makes New York the 15th state to restore voting rights to people still on parole, the governor’s office said, and it would impact some 35,000 current parolees.
